item.title: Agile Yorkshire Presentation 11/02/2014 - DevOps 101
item.description: Last week we presented a "DevOps 101" talk to the fine people over at Agile Yorkshire. http://www.agileyorkshire.org/event-announcements/11thfebsebroseandbadtestgoodtestandyburginwithadevops101 We covered some of the "classic" definitions of DevOps from Adam Jacobs, John Willis and Damon Edwards, although the slightly sweary version from @lusis was perhaps the most well received. We discussed the history of the movement and the principles it builds upon from Systems Thinking, Therory of Constraints and Lean, including a detailed look at how those are applied to CAMS (Culture, Automation, Measurement and Sharing).
